column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''2''' is the second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Evidence of Grammatical Gender in the Quenya of the 'Secret Vice' Poems, and Present Thoughts on Past Tenses" — [[Patrick H. Wynne]].
* "A Linguistic Review of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Return of the Shadow" — Jorge Quiñonez.
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
